message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this amazing product, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the investment.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value you've mentioned, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to sell the product at $850000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900000. This is a competitive price, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $880000, but no higher. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value and the fact that you're trying to sell it to me.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm not willing to sell the product at $880000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: I'll sell it to you for $915000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a good value considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $915000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I'll only go up to $905000. That's the highest price I'm willing to pay for the product.
